function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of digital technology for quarantine and self-isolation monitoring","Impact":"Potential privacy concerns and data security risks related to personal health information","Mitigation":"Implementing strict data protection measures and privacy policies, and conducting regular security audits and assessments","Technologies":"Encryption, secure databases, access controls, and data anonymization","People":"Citizens subject to quarantine and self-isolation monitoring","Owner":"Government agencies and technology providers"},{"Description":"Use of AI-powered surveillance for monitoring and restricting public gatherings","Impact":"Infringement of privacy and surveillance concerns for individuals in public spaces","Mitigation":"Transparent guidelines for the use of surveillance technology, limitation of data collection to public health purposes, and public oversight of surveillance activities","Technologies":"Facial recognition, AI algorithms, and geolocation tracking","People":"General public in monitored areas","Owner":"Government agencies and law enforcement"},{"Description":"Enforcement of quarantine with tracking devices and fines","Impact":"Resistance and public backlash against intrusive measures, potential civil liberties concerns","Mitigation":"Clear communication of the necessity of the measures, consideration of alternative enforcement methods, and transparent governance of the tracking system","Technologies":"GPS tracking devices, enforcement software, and communication tools","People":"Individuals subject to quarantine and enforcement authorities","Owner":"Government agencies and law enforcement"}]}
